thread.title: Irrfan Khan crosses the 1 million mark on Facebook
thread.title_full: Irrfan Khan crosses the 1 million mark on Facebook - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Irrfan Khan crosses the 1 million mark on Facebook
text:
Irrfan Khan, who has received huge critical acclaim for his latest film, Talvar , has all the reasons to be happy.
He is overwhelmed with the love and affection from his fans. The actor recently achieved a milestone, as he hit the one million mark as far as the number of 'Like' on his Facebook page are concerned.
READ: Irrfan Khan: People form opinions based on headlines that may not be the truth
Irrfan has thanked all his fans and sent a sweet message for them. He said, "On the highway of the wonderful journey called life! Thank you for the milestones every step of the way, Thank you for the "1 million " love"
